page.title: 13Turnditch and Windley Show
page.content: The Turnditch and Windley Show is always held on the first Saturday of September. When it first stared it was held at the W.I.Hut but now it is really quite a big show so it is held at Hall Farm Windley. For the l984 Show there were 93 different classes to be entered,not to mention the Horse and Pony Classes.The day starts for the public at 9.30a.m. but most people go in the afternoon. The day finishes with a Barn Dance in the marquee. Special attractions are provided for the public to see. In 1984, they included a sheepdog display, the Brassington, Middleton and Wirksworth Band, the Delta Trampoline Club Display, the Ripley Green Garters and Ripley Morris Men,the Tansley Vaulting Team and a Punch and Judy Show.
